title: AppCDS failed if mongodb-liquibase extension present
body:
### Describe the bug

Generating appcds failed with error:
```
2023-06-06T11:59:41.751+0200 [DEBUG] [io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.AppCDSBuildStep] The process that was supposed to create AppCDS exited with error code: 1.
2023-06-06T11:59:41.751+0200 [WARN] [io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.AppCDSBuildStep] Unable to create AppCDS.
```

Fail is caused by quarkus app failed to connect to DB, which can be seen in debug logs running `build with gradle build -Dquarkus.package.create-appcds=true --debug`
```
Failed to start application (with profile [prod]): com.mongodb.MongoTimeoutException: Timed out after 30000 ms while waiting to connect. Client view of cluster state is {type=UNKNOWN, servers=[{address=localhost:27017, type=UNKNOWN, state=CONNECTING, exception={com.mongodb.MongoSocketOpenException: Exception opening socket}, caused by {java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused}}]
```



### Expected behavior

AppCDS generation success

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer: https://github.com/paloliska/app-cds-fail/tree/liquibase

1. build with gradle build -Dquarkus.package.create-appcds=true

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux *** 6.1.0-1013-oem #13-Ubuntu SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Thu May 18 16:45:09 UTC 2023 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

Openjdk version "17.0.7" 2023-04-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 17.0.7+7-Ubuntu-0ubuntu122.04.2) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 17.0.7+7-Ubuntu-0ubuntu122.04.2, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.1.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

8.1.1

### Additional information

also see https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/33842
